ResetCircuitBreaker resumes processing of Msg's in the state machine that
have been been paused using TripCircuitBreaker.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

</ParamsDetails>

If\nit is left empty all Msg processing for type URLs that the account is\nauthorized to trip will resume.","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}}}}},"description":"MsgResetCircuitBreaker defines the Msg/ResetCircuitBreaker request type.","required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
